Text:
Looking at their web site, it is an FSX product only, that may work with FS9 aircraft imported to FSX, but still with those fs9 aircraft the port light is lighter and brighter than the starport one.

Thanks anyway for sharing it.
For FS9, try Nick's Lightfix as an alternative. It's freeware, and really impressive.

Thx looking good 

REQ, AFS Designs A-380 without banners

Hi guys, I had the issue where it wouldn't install into FSX too. So I tried copying the setup file directly into the FSX install directory and ran it from there.
It worked first time.
Cheers

I almost forgot, 
Thanks to BlackBug for sharing.
